title: Drawing, "Textile Design:  Venusgärtgen [Venus' Little Garden]", designed 1911–17
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink on mount, upper left corner: MENUETT; Inscribed in pen and black ink on mount, center left: VENUSGÄRTCHEN.  Inscribed in blue crayon, upper right corner: (can't see because of frame)
creditline: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds
description: Chevron stripped bank alternating with tulip-shaped flowers with checkerboard interior sections in acqua on orange and lime background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design:  Venusgärtgen [Venus' Little Garden]", designed 1911–17.
designed 1911–17. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper. Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds. 1988-62-681.
